message: cfg grammar add implementation elif else block already able conditional evaluation bit arcane syntax junction channel filter expr1 ... flag final  channel filter expr2 ... flag final  channel flag final   however intuitive patch add syntactic sugar using else keywords achieve message foo ... elif message bar ... else ...  actually two format conditional expression one explicit filter expression message foo parser date parser else ...  one condition embedded log path  filter message foo parser date parser else ...  difference two second format would consider filter parser condition combined first one filter expression difference evaluation two format message contains foo date parser fails message dropped execution doe continue along else path doe contain foo else obviously taken message contains foo date parser fails else branch taken message doe contain foo change make configuration complex stuff lot simpler signed balazs scheidler balabit.com
